html:
Happy School – Personalized Assessment Report


Student Information

● Student Name: {{ doc.student_name or "" }}
● Grade/Class: {{ doc.gradeclass or "" }}
● Academic Year & Term: {{ doc.academic_year_and_term or "" }}
● Curriculum: {{ doc.curriculum or "" }}
● Date of Report: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.date) }}
● Tutor/Teacher: {{ doc.tutorteacher or "" }}

1. Academic Achievement

{% for row in doc.subject %} {% endfor %}
Subject Score/Grade Teacher Remarks Improvement Needed
{{ row.subjects or "" }} {{ row.scoregrade or "" }} {{ row.teacher_remarks or "" }} {{ row.improvement_data or "" }}

Overall Performance Level

{% for row in doc.skills %}
{% if row.performance_level == "Excellent" %}☑{% else %}☐{% endif %} Excellent {% if row.performance_level == "Good" %}☑{% else %}☐{% endif %} Good {% if row.performance_level == "Average" %}☑{% else %}☐{% endif %} Average {% if row.performance_level == "Need Support" %}☑{% else %}☐{% endif %} Need Support
{% endfor %}

2. Skill Developmentt

{% for row in doc.skills %} {% endfor %}
Skill Area Performance Level Notes
{{ row.skill_area or "" }} {{ row.performance_level or "" }} {{ row.notes or "" }}

3. Behaviour & Attitude

● Classroom participation: {{ doc.classroom_participation or "" }}
● Punctuality & Attention: {{ doc.panctuality or "" }}%
● Discipline & Respect: {{ doc.discipline or "" }}
● Peer Collaboration / Active Participation: {{ doc.peer_collaboration or "" }}

5.Holistic Growth

{% for row in doc.growth %} {% endfor %}
Area Observation
{{ row.area or "" }} {{ row.observation or "" }}

6.Behaviour & Attitude

● Strengths Observed : {{ doc.strength or "" }}
● Areas of Improvement: {{ doc.areas or "" }}
● Suggested Support Actions: {{ doc.suggested or "" }}

6. Parent/Tutor Engagement

● Parent Feedback: {{ doc.feedback or "" }}
● Tutor/Teacher Remark: {{ doc.remark or "" }}
● Parent Acknowledgment: {{ doc.acknowledgment or "" }}
name: happy print
